content.content: I’m sure the news today will hit all of us in different ways… For me, I’m shell-shocked, not really able to process that any of this is real. Nikolai and I have known each other for over a decade. He is the one who introduced me to Maker. He brought me into this amazing community. Through him, I’ve met some of the most wonderful people I know today. I will forever be grateful to him, and it pains me so much to accept… Whatever our differences… life is short…
